lore: The traditional tools of the Painboy help them to patch up even the most mangled Orks and send them back into the fight. Helpfully, all these gruesome surgical klaws, rippy saws and fat syringes also serve as an expedient means of dismembering the enemy with - if not surgical precision - at least a great deal of enthusiasm!

otherAbilities.name: Dok's Toolz:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

otherAbilities.name: Hold Still and Say ‘Aargh!':
otherAbilities.description: Each time an attack made by this model with its 'urty syringe scores a Critical Wound against a unit (excluding VEHICLE units), that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds .

wargear.description: This model can be equipped with 1 grot orderly.

warGearAbilities.ability: Once per battle, in your Command phase, if the bearer is leading a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.
